Today, April 4th, marks the day of MLK’s assassination.

His last speech, “I’ve Been to the Mountaintop,” delivered the evening before his passing, is critical to take in.

King may have been taken, but he left instructions.

Thank you @BerniceKing for your tireless work. https://twitter.com/berniceking/status/1113710829923446784 QT @BerniceKing “I may not get there with you, but I want you to know tonight, that we as a people will get to the Promised Land!” #MLK

We will get there. 

Don’t give up. 

There’s a more peaceful, just, humane world to build. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DZ5izY-U0AA-3oN.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/981330145259675648/vid/240x240/tTM9197qrox_BLoz.mp4?tag=2
